issue.title: [Rust] Extend JSON schema inference to nested types
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-10771](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-10771). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Schema inference is currently limited to primitive types and lists of primitive types.

This ticket is for work to extend it to nested types
